feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ngkoksongofficial

entry.title: 10.26am, 18 August 2023, marks the start of my official journey as a Presidential Candidate to continue to serve all Singaporeans. The Presidential Elections Committee has issued me the Certificate of Eligibility. As I reflect, I would like to honour the
entry.content: 10.26am, 18 August 2023, marks the start of my official journey as a Presidential Candidate to continue to serve all Singaporeans. The Presidential Elections Committee has issued me the Certificate of Eligibility. As I reflect, I would like to honour the generations before me who built the strong foundation of Singapore. For all of us, here and now, let's do our best for the current and future generations to realise our hopes and ensure that Singapore continues to thrive. I will give my very best to this Presidential bid, as I seek the privilege to be of service and build a united Singapore for the future. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Spent time with @Hao and dad on their new podcast! It's been such a joy learning from our youths! Social media has been a level playing field for an independent candidate like myself. To all my online friends supporting my efforts in this presidential el
entry.content: Spent time with @Hao and dad on their new podcast! It's been such a joy learning from our youths! Social media has been a level playing field for an independent candidate like myself. To all my online friends supporting my efforts in this presidential election, thank you. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: The President must be above politics. I am independent and I will be able to unify Singaporeans, regardless of their differences or political affiliations. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture
entry.content: The President must be above politics. I am independent and I will be able to unify Singaporeans, regardless of their differences or political affiliations. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: The only country in the world that GIC does not invest in is Singapore. In my time as Group CIO I made numerous international business networks with key appointment holders. I will be able to do do you proud on the global stage. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforo
entry.content: The only country in the world that GIC does not invest in is Singapore. In my time as Group CIO I made numerous international business networks with key appointment holders. I will be able to do do you proud on the global stage. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: The elected president needs to have the right experience and knowledge of how our economy is related to the global economy. This will ensure the president knows how to make a judgment call when it comes to safeguarding the reserves. #ngkoksong2023 #united
entry.content: The elected president needs to have the right experience and knowledge of how our economy is related to the global economy. This will ensure the president knows how to make a judgment call when it comes to safeguarding the reserves. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: True happiness comes from caring for others. When I was at GIC, I derived happiness from contributing to the welfare of Singaporeans. So whatever you do, consider asking yourself ‚Äòhow can I contribute to the happiness and welfare of another person?‚Äô Acts
entry.content: True happiness comes from caring for others. When I was at GIC, I derived happiness from contributing to the welfare of Singaporeans. So whatever you do, consider asking yourself ‚Äòhow can I contribute to the happiness and welfare of another person?‚Äô Acts of kindness and generosity expand your being. But when you are self centred, you contract into your ego. You have to understand this through your experiences in life ‚ù§Ô∏è #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #lifehacks #adulting #happiness

entry.title: Philanthropy is not just the giving of money. Companies in Singapore could do more to promote this idea of structured volunteerism. It means establishing a way for employees to contribute to community work. Encourage staff to go down to the ground and do
entry.content: Philanthropy is not just the giving of money. Companies in Singapore could do more to promote this idea of structured volunteerism. It means establishing a way for employees to contribute to community work. Encourage staff to go down to the ground and do simple things such as distributing food to the poor. It doesn‚Äôt cost a lot of money but it costs time. So the leadership of these organisations must set an example. üôå #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #adulting #happiness #love
